name: Car vs Zombie
description: "Do not crash into zombies!" - that's what my grandfather used to say, until he died. And my granddad was damn right! These reptiles can be killed only by an excellent dose of electricity. Therefore, collecting Coins and Fuel, do not forget about Lightning - it will help to score points for killing zombies. Coins then wave on a new car! Cars will be added in the future, write your wishes in the comments!
